Effective Date: July 5, 2025


1. Acceptance of Terms
 By using this application, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions.
 If you disagree with any part, please stop using the app immediately.


2. App Usage
 This healthcare app is designed to help users book appointments, manage medicines,
 chat with AI assistant, and view profiles. This app is not a substitute for real-time medical consultation.


3. User Responsibilities
 - Users must provide accurate information while signing up.
 - Users are responsible for keeping login credentials confidential.
 - Misuse of the app for harmful or illegal purposes is strictly prohibited.


4. Appointments & Cancellations
 Appointments are based on doctor availability. Users can cancel or reschedule
 based on individual doctor’s policies.


5. Payments
 All payments are handled by third-party payment gateways.
 We are not liable for failed or delayed transactions due to network/banking issues.


6. Intellectual Property
 All content including UI, graphics, code, and AI systems are property of Thunder .
 Unauthorized use is prohibited.


7. AI Chat Limitations
 The AI assistant is designed for informational purposes only.
 For real emergencies, please consult a licensed medical professional.


8. Modifications
 We reserve the right to change these terms. Continued use of the app implies acceptance of updates.


9. Contact
 For any questions, please email us at: support@yourcompany.com

Effective Date: July 5, 2025


1. Information We Collect
 - Personal Info: Name, Email, Contact, Date of Birth
 - Health Info: Appointment details, medicine schedules
 - Device Info: Device model, Android version
 - Location: To show nearby pharmacies


2. How We Use Your Data
 - To manage user profiles and appointments
 - To send notifications and medicine reminders
 - To improve AI recommendations
 - To show location-based services


3. Data Storage and Security
 Your data is encrypted and stored securely using Firebase and other trusted services.
 We implement best practices for data protection.


4. Sharing of Data
 We do not sell your data. Limited data may be shared with third-party tools for essential features like payments, maps, etc.


5. User Control
 - You may request data correction or deletion anytime.
 - You can withdraw consent by stopping app usage and requesting data deletion.


6. Children’s Privacy
 This app is not intended for children under 13 years.
 We do not knowingly collect data from minors.


7. Policy Changes
 Our Privacy Policy may change. We will notify users through in-app notification or email for major updates.


8. Contact
 For privacy-related questions, contact: privacy@thunder.com
